metadata.title: 5078-3 -- Squashfs-Tools vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-5078-1 fixed a vulnerability in Squashfs-Tools. That update was incomplete and could still result in Squashfs-Tools mishandling certain malformed SQUASHFS files. This update fixes the problem.  We apologize for the inconvenience.  Original advisory details:   Richard Weinberger discovered that Squashfs-Tools mishandled certain  malformed SQUASHFS files. An attacker could use this vulnerability to  write arbitrary files to the filesystem.
